title: How to Make Vegan Cream

steps.headline: Blend the cornflour to a thin paste with a small amount of soy milk in a saucepan.
steps.description: Add the rest of the 120mls then place it over low heat and stir until thickened.

steps.headline: Place in the blender the thickened soy milk, the brown sugar and the vanilla essence.
steps.description: Blend on low until all ingredients are mixed, adding the extra soy milk.

steps.headline: Continue to blend while slowly adding the vegetable oil.
Be aware that the mixture may ‘curdle’.
steps.description: Just stop the blender, stir the mixture with a spoon, perhaps adding some extra soy milk and continue blending and adding the oil.

text: Blend the cornflour to a thin paste with a small amount of soy milk in a saucepan. Add the rest of the 120mls then place it over low heat and stir until thickened. Place in the blender the thickened soy milk, the brown sugar and the vanilla essence. Blend on low until all ingredients are mixed, adding the extra soy milk. Continue to blend while slowly adding the vegetable oil.  Be aware that the mixture may ‘curdle’. Just stop the blender, stir the mixture with a spoon, perhaps adding some extra soy milk and continue blending and adding the oil. Use as required.
